sentences.sContent: The high cost of borrowing is inhibiting investment by industry in new equipment.
sentences.sCn: 高昂的借贷成本正抑制行业对新设备的投资。

remMethod.val: in(不) + hib(拥有) + it → 使不能拥有 → 抑制， 约束

words.tran: [助剂] 抑制剂，抗化剂；抑制者

trans.tranCn: 抑制， 约束； 起抑制作用
trans.tranOther: If something inhibits an event or process, it prevents it or slows it down
